query.statement:
SELECT B.ZZPJT_ID AS PSPID, B.BSTNK, C.KUNNR, C.KUNNR_NM AS KUNNRNM, C.VDATU, B.VKBUR, (SELECT ST.BEZEI FROM SAPHEE.TVKBT AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST.SPRAS = '3' AND ST.VKBUR = B.VKBUR) AS VKBURNM, B.VKGRP, (SELECT ST.BEZEI FROM SAPHEE.TVGRT AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST.SPRAS = '3' AND ST.VKGRP = B.VKGRP) AS VKGRPNM, C.ZMAN, C.ZMAN_NM,
-- -- VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 -- WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT -- AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID -- AND ST1.ERDAT <= B.RECAD_DA -- ORDER BY ST1.SEQ DESC -- FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), -- VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 -- WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT -- AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID -- ORDER BY ST1.SEQ -- FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ),0)) AS NETWR_F,
VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID AND ST1.ERDAT <= B.DEMAND_DA ORDER BY ST1.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID ORDER BY ST1.SEQ FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ),0)) AS NETWR_F,
--원가 변경전 -> 변경 후로 변경 (김종욱 SW 요청 2015.10.26) -- VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.WAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 -- WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT -- AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID -- AND ST1.ERDAT <= B.RECAD_DA -- ORDER BY ST1.SEQ DESC -- FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), -- VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.WAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 -- WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT -- AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID -- ORDER BY ST1.SEQ -- FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ),0) ) AS WAVWR_F, -- VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.CHWAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID AND ST1.ERDAT <= B.RECAD_DA ORDER BY ST1.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.WAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID ORDER BY ST1.SEQ FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ),0) ) AS WAVWR_F,
--VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZSDTW007 AS ST1 -- WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT -- AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID -- ORDER BY ST1.MAKE_MM DESC, ST1.ITEMNO DESC -- FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), 0 ) AS NETWR_CH, 0.0 AS NETWR_CH,
--VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.WAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZSDTW007 AS ST1 -- WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT -- AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID -- ORDER BY ST1.MAKE_MM DESC, ST1.ITEMNO DESC -- FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), 0 ) AS WAVWR_CH, 0.0 AS WAVWR_CH,
VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.CHNETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID ORDER BY ST1.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), 0 ) AS NETWR_L,
VALUE((SELECT SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(ST1.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(ST1.CHWAVWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0090 AS ST1 WHERE ST1.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST1.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID ORDER BY ST1.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), 0 ) AS WAVWR_L,
0.0 AS NETWR_GAP, 0.0 AS WAVWR_GAP, 0.0 AS NETWR_BF, 0.0 AS WAVWR_BF,
B.WAERK,
VALUE( (SELECT MAX(ST.IRATE) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0020 AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID), 0.0) AS PRO_R,
0.0 AS RATE_F, 0.0 AS RATE_CH, 0.0 AS RATE_L, '' AS BIGO1, CAST('' AS VARCHAR(3000)) AS BIGO2, CAST('' AS VARCHAR(3000)) AS BIGO3, CAST('' AS VARCHAR(3000)) AS BIGO4, HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS MAKE_MM, 0.0 AS MR_NETWR,
0.0 AS MR_NETWR_T, 0.0 AS MR_NETWR_CK, 0.0 AS MR_NETWR_CK1,
0.0 AS MR_RATE1, 0.0 AS MR_RATE2, '' AS ACTION, '' AS TYPE, '1' AS MR_NETWR_CKM,
0.0 AS RATE_I, 0.0 AS RATE_S,
VALUE((SELECT X3.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.VBAK AS X1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.VBELN = X2.VBELN AND X2.PARVW = 'Z1' INNER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X3 ON X2.MANDT = X3.MANDT AND X2.LIFNR = X3.LIFNR WHERE X1.MANDT = B.MANDT AND X1.VBELN = B.VBELN ), '') AS NAME1
,CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS VARCHAR(36)) AS ERNAM ,VALUE((SELECT ST.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST.USERNUMB = #G_USER_ID#), '') AS ERNAMNM ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS ERDAT
,'' AS AEUSN, '' AS AEUSNNM, '' AS AEDAT ,'' AS T_DEPT, '' AS EXAM , '' AS DEPARTMENT
,0.0 AS NETWR_SUM ,0.0 AS WAVWR_SUM ,0.0 AS NETWR_GAP_SUM ,0.0 AS WAVWR_GAP_SUM ,B.RECAD_DA
FROM SAPHEE.VBAK AS B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.ZZPJT_ID = C.POSID
WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.ZZPJT_ID = #PSPID#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
